description: '''Christian country music''' (sometimes marketed as '''country gospel''', '''gospel country''', '''positive country''' or '''inspirational country''') is music that is written to express either personal or a communal belief regarding [[Christianity|Christian]] life, as well as (in terms of the varying music styles) to give a Christian alternative to mainstream [[secular music]]. Christian country music is a form of [[Christian music]], and a subgenre of both [[Gospel music]] and [[Country music]].
